variable.label: Loco address (standard short)
variable.tooltip: Only if CV29, Bit5=0 Loco addresses 1- 23 for LGB MTS II, 1-127 for Dimax Navigator CV1
variable.label: Loco address (standard short)
Starting voltage
variable.tooltip: CV2 x (1/255 track power) CV2

Acceleration
variable.tooltip: CV3 x 2ms x (1/255 track power)- 1: rapid acceleration, 255: gradual acceleration CV3

Braking

variable.tooltip: The manufacturer's ID number (read only) CV8

Motor Frequency

variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

Long Address
variable.tooltip: Sets the Extended 4 digit address (Range 128-10239) (not LGB MTS) CV17-18
variable.label: Long Address
Normal direction of motion
variable.tooltip: Sets the relative direction of the loco when told to move forward CV29
variable.label: Normal direction of motion
Speed Steps
variable.tooltip: Sets the speed step mode. 128 speed steps are recognized automatically CV29
variable.label: Speed Steps
Analog conversion mode
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco can operate on conventional DC current (enables Power Source Conversion) CV29
variable.label: Analog conversion mode
Use Speed Table
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use manufacturer's internal or user-defined speed step table CV29
variable.label: Use Speed Table
Addressing Mode
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use short or long address CV29
variable.label: Addressing Mode
Function commands
variable.tooltip: When serial is selected, F1 - F8 also can be triggered parallel. CV49
variable.label: Function commands
Digital Back-EMF
variable.tooltip: Back-EMF keeps the loco speed constant even as the load varies. CV49
variable.label: Digital Back-EMF
Analog Back-EMF
variable.tooltip: Back-EMF keeps the loco speed constant even as the load varies. CV49
variable.label: Analog Back-EMF
Interface
variable.tooltip: If old LGB interface is selected, serial function commands must be selected as well. CV49
variable.label: Interface
Voltage for lights
variable.tooltip: Locos with interface = 32(full track power); direct connection of 5V bulbs = 5; direct connection of 19V bulbs = 26. CV50
variable.label: Voltage for lights
